notes:
Very rare monsters, not considered a boss, although they spawn irregularly and don't appear in the Tibian Library. On [[Folda]], they spawn in small groups, from 1 to 3. One '''Yeti''' group spawns close to the shovel hole, second group spawns little bit north east of the shovel hole and the third group spawns east of the shovel hole.

On [[Chyllfroest]], they spawn very rarely on the fourth floor of the mountain.

name: Yeti
strategy: While blocking '''Yetis''', try to keep at one of their diagonals to avoid the [[Ice Damage|Snow Wave]]. [[Paladin]]s can kill them with [[Assassin Star]]s and [[Ethereal Spear]]. [[Mage]]s should use [[Magic Shield]] and [[Sudden Death|Sudden Death Runes]] to take them down quickly.
